A self-driving car would revolutionize transportation and allow for more time for passengers to relax and enjoy their commute.
With the ability to program a car to drive itself, people could easily explore new areas and experience different cultures without the need for a human driver.
Self-driving cars could also reduce traffic congestion and improve safety on the roads, as they would be able to communicate with each other and adjust their speed and route accordingly.
The use of self-driving cars could also lead to a reduction in parking spaces and the need for parking garages, freeing up valuable real estate in cities.
Self-driving cars could also be used for last-mile transportation, allowing people to easily get from their home to a nearby public transportation hub or to their final destination.
